entry.title: Lawn Mower Trimmer Head - Cuts Grass Faster!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 34.99

When your lawn is looking a little shaggy it's probably time to give it a trim!

However, not many people get excited about mowing their lawn. For one, it's time-consuming and for two, it's laborious work.

The Lawn Mower Trimmer Head changes all of that! It quickly trims overgrown hedges, grass, gardens, and more! You can even till the garden with it! Designed with a unique chain structure that is more flexible compared to traditional nylon cable models, our trimmer is far more durable and powerful.

Features:
✓ Universal fit id flexible for M10 x 1.25 left-hand thread size
✓ The center of the bottom is crafted with strong, alloy material
✓ Basic structure is very simple to use. Works great for straight shaft gardens and pole trimmer tools
✓ Made from high quality steel that is extremely hard and sturdy. The chain blade is VERY sharp
✓ Our trimmer head with chain is a great replacement for your current model. It is made with imported technology with a thickening interface

Specifications:
✓ Material: Metal
✓ Size: 13cm x 11.5cm x 7 cm
✓ Garden Tools Part: Thickening Chain

Included:
— 1 X Chain Trimmer Head

entry.title: Ergonomic Garden Kneeler and Seat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 59.99

Reduce pain caused by long-time stooping and kneeling

✿ Happy Knees - This handy garden kneeler features an elevated kneeling pad that reduces aches from prolonged kneeling, and keeps your knees away from the muddy ground and grass.

The Ergonomic Garden Kneeler and Seat features a thick cushion specially designed to remove strain from your knees. It's elevated to keep your favorite jeans away from the jumble of mud and grass.

FREE GIFT: Order the brown or purple version and we will send you Garden Gloves as a FREE gift!

Avoid dirt and grass stains on your clothes

Ergonomic Design: Features an elevated kneeling pad that reduces fatigue from prolonged kneeling. Plus, it keeps knees off the dirty ground!

Kneeler & Chair In One: Flips over to become a garden chair! Can support up to 330 pounds

Foldable: The kneeler comes fully assembled and is able to fold up for easy carrying & storage

Durable: Made with a steel frame and EVA for added durability yet remains incredibly lightweight

Built-in Garden Tool Pouches: Attaches to the chair with Velcro and can hold garden tools, cellphone, and more!

Specifications:
✓ Open Dimensions: 23.5”(L) x 10”(W) x 19.5”(H)
✓ Folded Dimensions: 22.5”(L) x 9”(W) x 5”(H)
✓ Seat Dimensions: 16”(L) x 6.25”(W) x 2.25”(H)
✓ Pouch Dimensions: 14”(L) x 7.5”(W)
✓ Weight: 5lbs

Included:
— 1 X Garden Kneeler & Stool
— 1 X Double Pouch Pocket
— 1 X Instruction Manual

The Garden Hose Spray Nozzle is the perfect accessory for gardeners, homeowners, and more!

You'll find the jets of the Garden Hose Spray Nozzle to be powerful enough to clean away dirt and debris from your siding, sidewalks, and more! It can even wash a car

Right now, the Garden Hose Spray Nozzle is on sale!

Features:
✓ Slip-resistant, ergonomic grip design
✓ Effortlessly blast away dirt, twigs, leaves, mud, and mildew from sidewalks, terraces, driveways, and more
✓ Features a variety of watering modes
✓ Change mist settings by simply twisting the hose nozzle

Specifications:

✓ Weight: 320g

entry.title: Artificial Lily Solar Garden Stake Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ushoperra
Type:
Price: 36.99

Our illuminated solar lilies are stunning and give your garden or yard a gorgeous glow.

Our solar lights are powered by the sun.

No electricity means no increases on your power bill!

Perfect for the environment and your pocketbook!

Upgraded Version: The solar flower lights outdoor have larger lily flowers,which are made of tame fabric. The water proof glass is IP65, the flower & stem is made of high quality material proven to withstand in bad weather. We also upgraded a wider solar panel which converts sunlight into power faster and more efficient in cloudy weather,and more energy-efficient built-in battery to maximize lighting time.

Color Changing Light: Lily shaped stake light with 7 color-changing. Lily solar lights automatically lights up in the dark to illuminate your garden and pathway.Suitable for the Garden, Trees, Flowers,Flowerbed, Fence, Walkway, this garden solar lights Does it all.

Adjustable Stems & Leaves: Both stems and leaves are propped up by iron wire which gives ultra flexibility and durability. You can bend the solar flowers stems and leaves into different angel and style,and the lily shaped flower lights will stay in shape even after thousand times of bending.Flowers and leaves will not color fade easily even after being exposed to the sun.

Enjoy The Beauty: This beautiful Solar flower lights artificial flower garden stake light is at home outside. Equipped with 600mAh rechargeable battery, this solar stake lights can work about 6-8 hours at night if fully charged during the day.Let it decorate your garden during the day, convert sunlight into electricity, and when night falls, it will automatically light up to illuminate your garden and pathway.

Specifications:
✓ Material: Fabric
✓ Style: Solar Flower
✓ Solar Panel: Polycrystal Solar Panel
✓ Shade Material: Fabric

Included:
— 2 X Solar LED Flower Lights
